com.software.reuze

Class ms_StatisticsDouble

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.ms_StatisticsDouble

  • public class ms_StatisticsDouble
extends Object
    Standard statistics. This class provides methods for computing statistics such as min, max, mean, sample standard deviation, and sample variance.

    For additional documentation, see Section 2.2 of Introduction to Programming in Java: An Interdisciplinary Approach by Robert Sedgewick and Kevin Wayne.

      • covariance

        public double covariance(double[] xArray,
                double[] yArray)
        Computes the covariance between the two arrays.

        Array lengths must match and the common length must be at least 2.

        Parameters:
        xArray - first data array
        yArray - second data array
        biasCorrected - if true, returned value will be bias-corrected
        Returns:
        returns the covariance for the two arrays
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the arrays lengths do not match or there is insufficient data
